response.summary: Industrial Engineer from the National University of Colombia, interested in constantly learning new things about my career and about the industry. I did my internship at Ecopetrol S.A. in the Upstream Financial Management. I managed to be 3 semesters in the best averages of my career and I was the third best final grade of my generation. I was the best result in the "Pruebas Saber Calendario A 2016" tests. Recognized for being one of the best Saber Pro scores at the National Level in Industrial Engineering 2021. Previously at Ecopetrol and PayU, currently at Ernst & Young in FSO- Data & Analytics.
response.skills: Google Cloud, Apache Airflow, data, HubSpot, Microsoft Power BI, PostgreSQL, Visualización de datos, MySQL, Microsoft Excel, Python, Ofimática, Trabajo en equipo, Capacidad de análisis, Microsoft Power Query, PowerPivot, SQL, Tableau

profile_positions.description: - Consultancy to companies in the data area for the automation of manual and repetitive processes from their origin and upload to databases to their visualization and consumption by end users: - Working closely with business stakeholders to translate complex business problems into analysis requirements and define data product details. - Document systems and analytics solutions and be able to translate technical jargon into business-friendly terminology. - Conduct structured end to end analysis to inform product strategy, data architecture, and reporting decisions. - Prototype and drive the vision for future state data architecture. - Develop SQL queries and be comfortable creating data visualizations to fulfill ad hoc analytical requests - Monitor data pipelines and solve operational and data issues. - Validate data pipelines to ensure data integrity and consistent reporting of analytics metrics and dimensions.
profile_positions.title: FSO - Data & Analytics Consultant

profile_positions.description:
- Co-create the insights and analytics practice by creating/securing agile processes, analytical methodologies, software and hardware, knowledge management systems, MIS and advanced analytics, and solutions that enhance decision making within SMB CO organization.
- Understand and transmit business strategies based on analytics to improve merchant life cycle management and digital marketing in order to positively impact lifetime value, activation, deepening and retention.
- Help structure business knowledge to materialize it in data modeling.
- Ensure reporting process of the area.
- Execute and understand automated solutions that allow generating value by leveraging business objectives while reducing operability. Provide technical guidance and problems resolution techniques to the team.
- Support generation of data frames to solve specific business requirements.
profile_positions.title: SMB Insights & Analytics Analyst

profile_positions.description: Online and working with DB – To enrich the data such as real vertical, size of the business (employees), etc. – to be able to better target our offer to them. - Collecting data, reviewing current customers, analyzing market trends, running the numbers, and creating detailed reports. - Prepares and delivers visualizations and internal presentations that translate analytic insights into tangible, actionable solutions for business partners to implement. Offline – Understanding why SMBs do not want to use formal payments (Card and online) and how we can bring them into the payment ecosystem. - Acquires and compiles structured and unstructured data and verifies its quality, accuracy and reasonableness. - Performs analyses of historical data to surface trends and insights using analytical methods. - Participates in special projects and performs other duties as assigned.
profile_positions.title: Sales Data SMB Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Functions:

- Carry out an analysis of the market environment for hydrocarbons, prices of crude oil, gas, products and TRM.
- Support the monthly closing and the Rolling & Planning processes: Databases, EBITDA Graphs, P&L Summary Table and monthly EBITDA Result.
- Support the construction of the monthly results reports of the One Pager Flash Report Segment.
- Participate in the continuous improvement of the Closing and Financial Planning Processes.
- Design and structuring of automation tools that facilitate the analysis and raising of alerts.
- Participate in the processes of structuring and development of documentation processes within GFU.
profile_positions.title: Upstream Financial Management Intern

profile_positions.description: Support for the activities of the Production Engineering Workshop and Plant Design Workshop
profile_positions.title: Assistant Student (Monitor) Plant Design Workshop

Deloitte drives progress. Our firms around the world help clients become leaders wherever they choose to compete.
